thread.section_title: olive + piper Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of olive + piper | oliveandpiper.com
thread.title: Michelle Hernandez
thread.title_full: olive + piper reviewed by Michelle Hernandez

author: Michelle Hernandez
title: Michelle Hernandez
text: I ordered the mikhael convertible necklace and pave x ring in rose gold. I'm loving and obsessed with my necklace purchase. Wear it with everything! The ring I was disappointed in only because the metal tarnished within two days of wearing it and turns my finger green(none of my other rings do this). I always remove my jewelry before washing my hands or when applying lotions. I will continue to order from here but will think twice about purchasing any rings. Aside from that I was very happy with my order.
